title: Latvia Economic Sentiment Indicator
description: Economic Optimism Index in Latvia increased to 91.50 in October from 91 in September of 2022. Economic Optimism Index in Latvia averaged 94.22  from 1993 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 117.50  in January of 2007 and a record low of 27.40  in July of 1993. In Latvia, economic sentiment indicator refers to the general social economic situation among manufacturers, service providers, traders, constructors and consumers in a defined period. This page provides - Latvia Economic Sentiment Indicator- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Statistical Bureau of Latvia
